Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API

Source: vignettes/articles/mcr-taxon-crosswalk.Rmd
mcr-taxon-crosswalk.Rmd
library(provider)


Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk API


The Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk dataset lists the providers and suppliers eligible to enroll in Medicare programs with the proper healthcare provider taxonomy code. This data includes the Medicare speciality codes, if available, provider/supplier type description, taxonomy code, and the taxonomy description. This dataset is derived from information gathered from the National Plan and Provider Enumerator System (NPPES) and the Provider Enrollment, Chain and Ownership System (PECOS).

  • Medicare Provider and Supplier Taxonomy Crosswalk


taxonomy_crosswalk(taxonomy_code = "2086S0102X")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   medicare_specialty_code medicare_provider_supplier_type_desc…¹ provi…² provi…³
#>   <chr>                   <chr>                                  <chr>   <chr>  
#> 1 2                       Physician/General Surgery              2086S0… Allopa…
#> # … with abbreviated variable names
#> #   ¹​medicare_provider_supplier_type_description, ²​provider_taxonomy_code,
#> #   ³​provider_taxonomy_description_type_classification_specialization


npi_mpstc <- npi_list |> purrr::map_dfr(provider_nppes) |> 
                         dplyr::group_split(outcome) |>
                         purrr::map_dfr(provider_unpack)
#> Error in as_mapper(.f, ...): object 'provider_unpack' not found

npi_mpstc |> dplyr::distinct(taxon_code) |> 
             tibble::deframe() |> 
             purrr::map_dfr(provider_mpstc)
#> Error in as_mapper(.f, ...): object 'provider_mpstc' not found



API Data Dictionary


Variable Term Definition

medicare_specialty_code

 Medicare Specialty Code Specialty code that corresponds to the listed Medicare specialty

medicare_provider_supplier_type_description

 Medicare Provider/Supplier Type Description The description of the Medicare Provider/Supplier Type

provider_taxonomy_code

 Provider Taxonomy Code The taxonomy codes the Providers use

provider_taxonomy_description_type_classification_specialization

 Provider Taxonomy Description The description of the taxonomy that the Providers use
